# Problem 1: 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
library(rvest)

set.seed(10)

iris_with_missing = iris %>% 
  map_df(~replace(.x, sample(1:150, 20), NA)) %>%
  mutate(Species = as.character(Species)) %>%
  janitor::clean_names ()
```
